title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Fundamentals of RIS-Based Wireless Communication System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operating principles of RIS (Reconfigurable Intelligent Surface) and its application cases in wireless communication systems.
Learners can mathematically model the optimization process of RIS phase adjustment and transmit precoder design in multi-user MIMO systems.
Learners can understand proposed optimization techniques (alternating optimization, neural network-based approaches) and apply them to interpret simulation results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
